name: org.openrewrite.featureflags.RemoveBooleanFlag
displayName: Remove a boolean feature flag for feature key
description: Replace method invocations for feature key with value, and simplify constant if branch execution.
category3Description: Recipes to perform feature flag migration tasks.
options: [{"name":"methodPattern","type":"String","displayName":"Method pattern","description":"A method pattern to match against. The first argument must be the feature key as `String`.","example":"dev.openfeature.sdk.Client getBooleanValue(String, Boolean)","required":true},{"name":"featureKey","type":"String","displayName":"Feature flag key","description":"The key of the feature flag to remove.","example":"flag-key-123abc","required":true},{"name":"replacementValue","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Replacement value","description":"The value to replace the feature flag check with.","example":"true","required":true}]
